original_text: And those members of the body, which we think to be less honourable, upon these we bestow more abundant honour; and our uncomely parts have more abundant comeliness.
korean_text: 우리가 몸의 덜 귀히 여기는 그것들을 더욱 귀한 것들로 입혀 주며 우리의 아름답지 못한 지체는 더욱 아름다운 것을 얻느니라 그런즉

sentences.original_text: And those members of the body
which we think to be less honourable
upon these we bestow more abundant honour
sentences.korean_translation: 이것들에게 우리는 더 풍성한 존귀를 부여하며
